name: Gym Slimming vest
description:
Our GYM Latex Vest is a superior body shaper that accelerates weight loss through high compression, perspiration. This Vest helps you get the figure you always wanted by instantly lifting, shaping and slimming the body and flattening your stomach, waist and hips. To loose weight and reduce waist measurements, it is recommended to wear the the vest for 6 to 8 hours daily. Our GYM Latex vest is Clinically proven to help reduce waist measurements from 1 to 4 inches within 30 days.

- Support and Breast Enhancement
-Maximum abdominal compression to reduce waist and flatten your abdomen
- Made with Latex on the outside and cotton on the inside cover
- Exerts pressure on the torso shaping loose skin and sculpting the figure.
- Has 2 rods in front and two in the back

name: The Ultimate waist experience
description:
Train your waist with the Latex Long Cincher. The Latex Long Cincher is a superior body shaper that accelerates weight loss through high compression, perspiration and micro massage. This cincher helps you get the figure you always wanted by instantly lifting, shaping and slimming the body and flattening your stomach, waist and hips. To lose weight and reduce waist measurements, it is recommended to wear the corset between 6 to 8 hours a day. The Slimming Thermal Cincher is the only clinically proven Cincher that helps reduce waist measurements from 1 to 4 inches within 30 days.

ALL OF OUR CINCHER'S ARE AUTHENTIC IMPORTED FROM COLOMBIA

-Burns fatty tissue by making you sweat
-Targets the back, torso, waist and abdomen areas
-Helps you loose those extra inches
-Provides abdominal support

Our short gym waist cincher firms, tightens and tones your stomach while doing everyday activities or exercising ,Guaranteed to lose 2-4in in 30days

Refirms and tones your skin! Contains seaweed and spirulina to naturally revitalize your skin and help with elasticity. Ideal for full body treatments. Works to fight cellulite and smooth stretch marks.



*Firms and tones the skin

*Contains marine algae and espirulina

*Ideal for the whole Body

*Can be used with body shapers

name: Adjustable vest bundle
description:
This Latex Vest with adjustable straps is a superior body shaper that accelerates weight loss through high compression, perspiration. This Vest helps you get the figure you always wanted by instantly lifting, shaping and slimming the body and flattening your stomach, waist and hips. To loose weight and reduce waist measurements, it is recommended to wear the girdle between 6 to 8 hours daily. Our Latex vest is the only clinically proven girdle that helps reduce waist measurements from 1 to 4 inches within 30 days. THIS VEST WORKS THE SAME AS THE LATEX VEST THE ONLY DIFFERENCE IS ONE HAS ADJUSTABLE STRAPS &THE OTHER DOES NOT & THE STRAPS ARE THICKER.

BUNDLE INCLUDES:
1- ADJUSTABLE STRAP VEST
1- OSMOTIC WRAP
1-TRIPLE ACTION GEL used for firming and fat burning To firm skin must be refrigerated used at night with osmotic wrap , For fat burning use at room temperature with osmotic wrap under your vest .

FOR MAXIMUM RESULTS WHILE USING THE VEST WE RECOMMEND YOU DRINK LOTS OF WATER .

ALL OF OUR CORSETS ARE AUTHENTIC IMPORTED FROM COLOMBIA

name: Triple Action Cream
description:
Our triple action gel contains a rich formula with components that sink right into the skin & burn fat cells to help define a perfect silhouette.It also Minimizes the appearance of cellulite.

Ingredients: Ginko biloba & sea weed

HOW TO USE: Keep refrigerated , Use at night & with our osmotic wrap for best results.

AUTHENTIC IMPORTED PRODUCT FROM COLOMBIA

name: Get Started Bundle
description:
1 Short Gym Waist Cincher Color Of Choice
1 8oz Triple Action Gel

Our short gym waist cincher firms, tightens and tones your stomach while doing everyday activities or exercising ,This shaper is for those who have a short torso. Guaranteed to lose 2-4in in 30days

Our Triple Action Gel is Rich formula with components that sink right into the skin and burn grease to help define a perfect silhouette. Minimizes the appearance of cellulite,For best results use with our osmotic wrap for maximum absorption.

Our waist cincher is 100% iodized latex covered in a thin layer of cotton.

Ingredients in Triple Action Gel: Purified Water, Carbomer, Thiethanolamine, Ginkgo Bilboa, Vitamin C, Alphalipoic Acid, Vitamin E, Fragance, Kathon CG.

ALL OF OUR PRODUCTS ARE AUTHENTIC IMPORTED FROM COLOMBIA.
